title: The Rise and Potential of Large Language Model Based Agents: A Survey

sections.description: Introduce the topic of large language model-based agents, highlighting their significance in AI and natural language processing. Discuss the motivation for the survey and its relevance in the current technological landscape. Include a subsection 'Structure of the Survey' to outline the organization of the paper.
